branchCategory.name: Manifolds

branchItem.name: SS5J2-60S, Plug-in Manifold (for EX180)
branchItem.description: <p>SJ2000 manifold with EX180 serial transmission system.  EX180 series is serial communication module capable of controlling 32 solenoids.  Available with CC-Link and DeviceNet<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">™</span>.</p>

branchItem.name: SS5J2, Manifold, D-Sub Connector Kit, Flat Ribbon Cable Kit, PC Wiring
branchItem.description: <p>SJ2000 manifold with D-Sub, Flat Ribbon and PC Wiring connection.  Up to 24 solenoids can be connected.</p>

branchItem.name: SS5J2-G, Plug-in Manifold, PC Wiring System w/Power Supply Terminal
branchItem.description: <p>SJ2000 manifold with PC Wiring connection with separate power supply terminal.  Up to 16 solenoids can be connected.</p>

branchItem.name: SS5J2-60S6B, Plug-in Manifold (for EX510)
branchItem.description: <p>SJ2000 manifold with EX510 gateway serial transmission system.  EX510 can connect up to 64 outputs and 64 inputs.  Available protocol include CC-Link, DeviceNet<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">™, and Profibus</span><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">®</span><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">.</span></p>

branchItem.name: SS5J2-60, Non Plug-in Manifold, Individual Wiring
branchItem.description: <p>SJ2000 manifold for individual wiring.  Up to 20 stations can be connected per manifold.</p> <p> </p>

branchItem.name: SS5J2, Plug-in Cable Manifold, D-Sub Connector, Flat Ribbon Cable
branchItem.description: <p>SJ2000 Plug-in cable type manifold with D-sub, Flat Ribbon connection.  Up to 20 solenoids can be connected.</p>
